content: solar system mercury _____________________________________________________________________________________________________ crochet level advanced beginner/intermediate special stitches crochet terms us popcorn - make 4 double_crochet in same space remove hook and insert hook in top of first double_crochet grab loop and pull through this pattern is available in english only v-st - double_crochet ch1 double_crochet wide v - double_crochet ch2 double_crochet i made my square with sport yarn and crochet hook size bpdc - back post double_crochet - insert hook from back to front 4 5 my square measures just over 5 around the post of indicated stitch with worsted weight yarn and crochet hook size 5 or ________________________________________________ 5 5mm your square should measure about 6 abbreviations start with a magic_ring magic_ring - magic_ring round - round round 1 in magic_ring start with a ch1 8 single_crochet in ring close with a slip_stitch in space - space first single_crochet 8 single_crochet skip - skip stand - standing round 2 ch1 single_crochet in same st * ch1 single_crochet in next st repeat around st - stitch ch1 slip_stitch in first single_crochet to close* or with new color stand single_crochet in slip_stitch - slip_stitch any st repeat from * to * around cut yarn 8 single_crochet 8 ch1 space yo - yarn over chain - chain round 3 skip all single_crochet work only in chain space single_crochet - single_crochet with new color stand double_crochet in any chain space ch2 double_crochet in same st half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet wide v made *v-st in next chain space wide v in next chain space* double_crochet - double_crochet repeat from * to * around omitting the last wide v close with a slip_stitch in first double_crochet and cut yarn 4 wide v 4 v-st round 4 skip all double_crochet and v-st work only in ch2 space of the wide v with new color stand double_crochet in any wide v ch2 space 7 double_crochet in same chain space ch2 *8 double_crochet in next wide v ch2 space ch2* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch in first double_crochet to close and cut yarn 32 double_crochet 4 ch2 space round 5 with new color stand bpdc around 2nd double_crochet of any fan * ch1 bpdc around next double_crochet 5 times ch1 skip last double_crochet work in front of rd4 in skip v-st chain space from round 3 popcorn in chain space of v-st ch1 back in current round skip first double_crochet bpdc around next double_crochet* repeat from * to * around omitting the last double_crochet close with a slip_stitch in first double_crochet and cut yarn 24 bpdc 4 popcorn 28 ch1 space round 6 skip all double_crochet with new color stand half_double_crochet in chain space after any popcorn *2 single_crochet in next chain space 2 half_double_crochet in next chain space 2dc ch2 2 double_crochet in next chain space corner 2 half_double_crochet in next chain space 2 single_crochet in next chain space half_double_crochet in next chain space fphdc around next popcorn half_double_crochet in next chain space* repeat from * to * around omitting the last half_double_crochet
